reporting_cycle: The Group of Experts to provide a mid-term report no later than 30 October 2015, and a final report no later than 15 June 2016
summary:
30. Requests MONUSCO to assist the Committee and Group of Experts, within its capabilities, by passing relevant information to implement sanctions measures.

31. Calls on all States, particularly those in the region and where designated individuals/entities are based, to regularly report to the Committee on actions taken to implement measures.

32. Emphasizes the importance of regular consultations with concerned Member States to ensure full implementation of measures.

33. Requests Special Representatives to share relevant information with the Committee.

34. Decides to review measures set forth in this resolution by 1 July 2016, adjusting them as appropriate, in light of the security situation in the DRC.

35. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
